Text.Page:
Why is it every conversation about you has the word "corpse" in it?

It doesn't matter. The {@LinkCreature:22#28#dark prelates} and the {@LinkCreature:22#27#ensorceled disc reapers} are guarding the chapel. I think there's a link between their altar and what's happened here, so you're going to kill them.

These cultists are so over.

Thanks to you, the Scions of Lok have been crushed and this mindmagic thingy is weakened.

Now, perhaps, we can begin retaking our home. All thanks to me.

Well, and you.
